Tecnativa/docker-socket-proxy

security proxy for Docker socket access

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Proxy for read-only, rootless Docker socket access
  • Filters Docker API response content
  • nginx reverse proxy for Docker containers using docker-gen
  • self-hosted reverse proxy tunnels for Docker apps using WireGuard, NGINX, and Caddy
  • Rootless and distroless HTTP reverse proxy image
  • Forwards websites with SSL via Docker container
  • Connects Docker containers to Pi-Hole and Nginx Proxy Manager
  • Reverse proxy for Docker and other services with web UI, automation tools, and traffic control
  • Docker stack for local development with automated reverse proxy
  • reverse proxy for Docker containers using Caddy and labels
